description: This course is all about building your technique (also called "chops"). All the major aspects of technique are covered, from alternate picking, to left0hand stretch and endurance, speed, accuracy and so on. The course is designed as a five-day workout, to be repeated each week until memorized. Just watch the videos and follow along, but please use CAUTION: A little discomfort in your left hand is normal, but if the pain persists after you stop playing, please take some time off.
title: Guitar Technique Mastery: The Ultimate Chop Building Workout
